section.p: Contains the the recording results of of the skintest performed.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
The date the test was evaluated.

Contains exactly one [1..1] reading with data type Code
the value of the result

Contains exactly one [1..1] testResult with data type Code
This is where the clinician assigns the observation of the reading of the test. i.e the test reading is possitive, negative, doubtful, or no take.
Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Author

Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
The date the test was evaluated.

Contains exactly one [1..1] reading with data type Code
the value of the result

Contains exactly one [1..1] testResult with data type Code
This is where the clinician assigns the observation of the reading of the test. i.e the test reading is possitive, negative, doubtful, or no take.
Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Author
